articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of KPA Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of KPA Supreme Commander
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Thursday to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, soldiers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, delivered a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il's gaining of the KPA supreme commandership on December 24, Juche 80 (1991) was a historic event of weighty significance in developing the revolutionary armed forces in the DPRK and accomplishing the cause of socialism. 
					
					 This made it possible for the KPA to invariably preserve its revolutionary character as the army of President Kim Il Sung and the WPK in any storm and stress and for the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered with arms to successfully be accomplished, he said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il enforced the Songun politics with the KPA as a main force in all fields for the first time in history by making a deep insight into the rapidly changing international political situation in the 1990s and the requirements of the developing Korean revolution with his far-sighted wisdom. He thus brought about a historic change to be specially recorded in the history of building the revolutionary armed forces of Juche.
					
					 Thanks to his bold decision and tireless leadership, the defence industry of the DPRK is now capable of producing any ultra-modern weapon as it pleases and the KPA is demonstrating its might as a matchless revolutionary army with powerful offensive and defensive means.
					
					 All the party members, soldiers and people of the DPRK should enshrine the unshakeable faith that victory is in store for the revolutionary cause of Juche and a bright future for Songun Korea only when they devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and protect Kim Jong Il politically and ideologically and with their lives in any adversity.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the situation remains so tense on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out any moment, the reporter said:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces perpetrated such grave military provocation as renewing their shelling against the DPRK during their recent exercises for a war of aggression in the West Sea of Korea. This indicates that the enemy's scenario for aggression aimed at the start of another Korean War, has reached the phase of its implementation.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK never make an empty talk. 
					
					 Should the enemies intrude into the sky, land and seas of the DPRK even 0.001 mm, the KPA will as ever continue dealing more devastating physical blows at them without hesitation. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are getting fully prepared to launch a sacred war of justice of Korean style based on the nuclear deterrent at anytime necessary to cope with the enemies' actions deliberately pushing the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 In case the U.S. imperialists and their followers finally spark off an all-out war, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will not only wipe out the aggressors but blow up their bases and thus eradicate the root cause of war and surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, warned the reporter.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets St. Vincent and Grenadines PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets St. Vincent and Grenadines PM
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim on Dec. 21 sent a congratulatory message to Ralph Gonsalves upon his re-assumption of office as prime minister of Saint Vincent and Grenadines. 
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop, the message wished him success in his work for the country's development and the people's happiness.

articles.title: DPRK, Cuba Cooperate in Economy
articles.content:
DPRK, Cuba Cooperate in Economy
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK and Cuban governments signed protocols for 2011 in Pyongyang Thursday.
					 They are a protocol on a meeting for cooperation and development in economy, science and technology and a protocol on commodity exchange.  
					
					 Present from the DPRK side were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned and from the Cuban side Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Congratulations from Military Attaches
articles.content:
Congratulations from Military Attaches
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory message from the military attaches corps here on the 19th anniversary of his gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, conveyed them to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Enjoy Acrobatics
articles.content:
Military Attaches Enjoy Acrobatics
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here enjoyed acrobatics on Thursday.
					 The performance is to celebrate the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Through witty technique and masterly skill the performance showed the appearance of the Korean army and people who are reliably defending the country and pushing ahead with building of a thriving socialist nation, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Revolutionary Activities of Kim Jong Suk Remembered
articles.content:
Revolutionary Activities of Kim Jong Suk Remembered
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The exhibition of memorabilia on the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, is drawing many servicepersons, working people and school youth and children everyday on the occasion of her 93rd birth anniversary.
					 Looking round photos and relics, books, art works, etc. on the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Suk, the visitors expressed profound reverence for her who performed undying feats, holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun. 
					
					 They looked round with keen interest historic materials telling about her revolutionary family and childhood, her activities as a leading member of the young communist league and a leader of the children's corps and the military and political activities conducted by her after joining the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and her activities to faithfully implement Kim Il Sung's line of founding the party and the army and building the country after liberation.
					
					 They were deeply impressed to see materials telling about the noble life of Kim Jong Suk who made an undying contribution to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause by devotedly protecting the President and upholding his idea and cause.
					
					 Listening to the lecturer, they keenly realized that the great exploits Kim Jong Suk performed by bringing up the bright star of Mt. Paektu and thereby making sure that the Korean nation is blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation will shine forever with the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Life Devoted to Future of Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Life Devoted to Future of Revolution
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- With the approach of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk's birth anniversary (December 24), the Korean people are recollecting her great life devoted to the future of revolution. 
					 During the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle, she was deeply concerned for the work of the Children's Corps, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung to bring up children on revolutionary lines.
					
					 On the morning of a November day, Juche 21 (1932), she climbed a mountain together with members of the Children's Corps to enjoy the sunrise. She told them just as any organism in the world could never exist without the sun, the Children's Corps members could not live without the President.
					
					 She often told them about the beautiful scenes, abundant natural resources and brilliant culture of Korea, and the Korean people's struggle against aggressors, encouraging them to love the homeland and look forward to the future.
					
					 She also risked any danger for the security of children.
					
					 She did not hesitate to lure enemies away from children and throw herself into fire to save a child.
					
					 The members of the Children's Corps taught by her became fine revolutionaries and performed feats in the war for the liberation of the homeland.

articles.title: Events of 17th WFYS Held in South Africa
articles.content:
Events of 17th WFYS Held in South Africa
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings and seminars on diverse themes, part of the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students, took place on Dec. 17 and 18.
					 Members of the DPRK delegation of youth and students made speeches on such themes as the best socialist system in the DPRK guided by the Juche idea and the policy of attaching importance to youth and the role of the Korean youth. 
					
					 Delegates of various countries lauded the advantages of the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses and the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of giving importance to the youth and expressed their will to strengthen support and solidarity with the Korean people. 
					
					 The International Anti-Imperialist Tribunal was held on Dec. 19 and 20.
					
					 The tribunal heard and discussed indictments brought against the U.S.-led imperialists who are harassing global peace and security and conducting aggression war and economic blockade and sanctions against other countries. 
					
					 On Dec. 20 the DPRK delegation had meetings with the youth and student delegations of Vietnam and Laos and gave art performances in different places.

articles.title: Antarctic Exploration Activities
articles.content:
Antarctic Exploration Activities
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK started Antarctic exploration activities twenty years ago.
					 After joining the Antarctic Treaty in Juche 76 (1987), the DPRK made two rounds of Antarctic expedition from January 1990 to October 1991.
					
					 The first expedition team arrived in the Antarctic on May 5, 1990 to make a survey of the area and choose the site of an Antarctic scientific research base.
					
					 It also set up a signpost with letters "First Antarctic Expedition Team of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" at a place 67 degrees, 55 minutes and 23 seconds south latitude and 44 degrees, 32 minutes and 10 seconds east longitude.
					
					 The second expedition took place from October 16, 1990 to October 4, 1991.
					
					 The second team established a scientific base at the same place on December 22, 1990, naming it "Season-1". 
					
					 The base covered 157.6 square meters at that time.
					
					 The team stayed there for more than a hundred days to study the weather, coastal ice, aurora and geological features of the area and collect samples of minerals, stones, animals and plants.
					
					 It also expedited other places to choose the site of a fixed scientific base and erected a signpost carved with the name of the country and a picture of its flag at a place 69 degrees, 22 minutes and 28 seconds south latitude and 76 degrees, 23 minutes and 30 seconds east longitude.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces US-Japan-S. Korea Military Alliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces US-Japan-S. Korea Military Alliance
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff (JCS) underscored the urgent need to boost "security cooperation" among the U.S., Japan and south Korea during his recent junket to Japan. He also called for putting joint military exercises into practice to cope with another "provocation" by the DPRK, according to Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 "This anachronistic claim is aimed to harass peace and stability in Northeast Asia and spark off a new Cold War through speedy formation of the triangular military alliance," the commentary said.
					
					 "The U.S. planned escalation of the tension on the Korean Peninsula and its efforts to create the alliance under this pretext are another provocation to increase the military threat to the DPRK and drive the situation to the brink of a war," the paper added.
					
					 The news analyst said that the U.S. used the conspiratorial "Cheonan" sinking case for settling the issues of transfer of its forces' military base in Futenma and the extension of the wartime operation control in south Korea. It thus created a precedent of its naval task force's advance to the West Sea of Korea, providing an atmosphere favorable for making the alliance operational in actuality, the commentary observed.
					
					 "The U.S. orchestrated the Yonphyong Island incident under a sinister scenario to round off the elements of the alliance and lay a foundation for building NATO of Asian version," the paper said.
					
					 "This is evidenced by the crowded programs the U.S. JCS chairman had during his recent visits to Japan and south Korea to realize the first U.S.-Japan-south Korea military exercises in the wake of the U.S.-south Korea and the U.S.-Japan war maneuvers," the commentary noted.
					
					 "The Cold War-minded U.S. is gravely mistaken if it thinks it can emerge a 'victor' by holding a military edge in Northeast Asia and sparking off a hot war," the newspaper concluded.

articles.title: S. Korea Plans War Exercises against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea Plans War Exercises against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The 5th Corps of the south Korean puppet forces announced that it would stage the largest-ever joint exercises on Dec. 23, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The puppet warmongers said that they would stage joint firing exercises in a drill ground in Phochon of Kyonggi Province with tanks, artillery pieces, F-15K fighter bombers and other war equipment involved.
					
					 They noted that "the exercises were aimed to boost the joint operation capacity of ground and air combat power under a system for making a real time detection of enemy's movements and striking them."
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff announced that it would stage maritime exercises of the navy's first fleet in the East Sea of Korea from Dec. 22 to 25, according to CBS of south Korea.
					
					 Six warships belonging to the command of the first fleet, helicopters and other huge forces are set to stage madcap exercises for a war against the DPRK. The exercises include an anti-submarine exercise and naval bombardment drill under the pretext of coping with enemy's maritime infiltration and provocation of a local war."
					
					 The warmongers, however, are claiming that the planned exercises are "a regular drill of an individual fleet" and "they have nothing to do with the Yonphyong Island incident" in a bid to conceal the provocative and offensive nature of the exercises.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Increasing Danger of War
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Increasing Danger of War
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The South Korean Solidarity of Youth issued a statement on Dec. 20 to accuse the puppet authorities of increasing the danger of a war.
					 The statement denounced the military authorities for finally staging a provocative shelling exercise in Yonphyong Island on the same day. 
					
					 It is a dangerous development that the authorities made hard-line remarks and staged military exercises one after another in the West Sea of Korea where the north and the south stand in acute confrontation, the statement held, adding: 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime can never be pardoned as it is evading the responsibility for bedeviled north-south relations and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 The young people do not want a war which may claim lives of innocent people, the statement said, urging the authorities to stop the reckless moves for a war at once.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted War Maneuvers Protested
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted War Maneuvers Protested
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- British organizations made public a joint statement on Dec. 18 to denounce the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities for driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					 They are the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association.
					
					 Accusing the south Korean puppet forces of scheme to ignite a war which will only invite their self-destruction, the statement expressed full support for the just stand of the Korean People's Army that it would make strong retaliation against the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea released a statement on the same day in support of the Dec. 16 statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula remains tense and dialogue fails to open due to the hostile policy toward the DPRK and the wild ambition for invasion pursued by the U.S. in systematic violation of international agreements, the statement pointed out.
					
					 It strongly demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces promptly stop all the military exercises threatening peace on the peninsula and the U.S. roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversaries of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversaries of DPRK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Events were held in countries and by a regional organization on Dec. 15 and 16 to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 A seminar took place in Syria, round-table talks and a film show in Uganda and an opening ceremony of week of DPRK book and photo exhibition by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement. 
					
					 On display there were books and photos on the feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Korean films shown were "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Army of the DPRK."
					
					 Speakers at the events lauded the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and the brilliant revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il is a treasured sword that helped the DPRK demonstrate its might as an invincible socialist state and a daily prospering power despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle it, they stressed.

articles.title: Acto por el 19o de nombramiento de Kim Jong Il, Comandante Supremo
articles.content:
Acto por el 19o de nombramiento de Kim Jong Il, Comandante Supremo 
						
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 19o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Participaron los cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de los sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion junto con los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del CDN de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					El nombramiento del Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del EPC el 24 de diciembre del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche fue un evento historico de suma importancia en el desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea y en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista, senalo el informante y prosiguio:
					
					Gracias a la ascension del Dirigente al cargo supremo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, el EPC pudo mantener invariablemente en cualesquier adversidades el caracter revolucionario de ejercito del lider y del partido y la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada con las armas pudo llevarse adelante sin algun defecto.
					
					Al percatarse con la clarividencia de la situacion politica internacional y la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo en la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado, el Comandante Supremo practico por primera vez en la historia la politica de Songun, que toma por el grueso al ejercito popular, de manera que logro un cambio historico a ser registrado en letras doradas en la historia de la construccion de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Gracias a la decision audaz y la direccion incansable del Dirigente, la industria de defensa nacional de nuestro pais pudo fabricar cualquier arma sofisticada y el EPC hace alarde de su poderio del invencible ejercito revolucionario dispuesto de todos los medios de ofensiva y de defensa.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y otros habitantes deben guardar la ferrea conviccion de que el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y el futuro radiante de la Corea del Songun radican en defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion, y proteger en lo ideo-politico y a costa de la vida al Dirigente aun en cualquier situacion dificil. 
					
					Hoy en dia, en la Peninsula Coreana se crea la situacion tan tensa en que se pueda desatar la guerra en cualquier momento. 
					
					Recientemente, los titeres surcoreanos desplegaron los ejercicios de guerra de agresion en el Mar Oeste de Corea y cometieron una grave provocacion militar disparando los fuegos artilleros contra la RPDC, lo cual muestra que el plan de agresion de los enemigos para desatar la segunda guerra coreana entra en la etapa de practica. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos no saben las palabras vanas. 
					
					En lo adelante tambien nuestro ejercito popular dara sin titubeo el golpe fisico mas fuerte a los enemigos que invadan ni una pulgada del cielo, la tierra y el mar de nuestra patria.
					
					Haciendo frente a las maniobras intencionales de los enemigos que llevan la situacion al borde de la guerra, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias disponen de todos los preparativos de librar en cualquier momento necesario la sagrada batalla de justicia a nuestro estilo basada en el disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					Si los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus fuerzas satelites desencadenan por fin la guerra total, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias aniquilaran despiadadamente no solo a los invasores sino tambien sus nidos para eliminar completamente el origen de la guerra y lograran sin falta la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Reuniones y simposios del FMJE
articles.content:
Reuniones y simposios del FMJE
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 17 y 18 reuniones y simposios por los  temas del XVII Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes.
					  Los miembros de la delegacion de la juventud y los estudiantes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea intervinieron con los temas: el sistema socialista de Corea es el mas ventajoso que materializa la idea Juche, la politica de dar importancia a la juventud y el papel de los jovenes coreanos, etc.
					
					  Los delegados de la juventud y los estudiantes de varios paises elogiaron la superioridad del sistema socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares, la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica de del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a la juventud y expresaron la voluntad de fortalecer el apoyo y la solidaridad con el pueblo coreano.
					
					  Por otra parte, el tribunal antiimperialista internacional, efectuado los dias 19 y 20, acuso, escucho y examino los actos de los imperialistas incluidos los yanquis, que destruyen la paz y la seguridad del mundo y libran la guerra agresiva, el bloqueo economico y las sanciones.
					
					  El dia 20, la delegacion coreana se reunio con las delegaciones de la juventud y los estudiantes de Vietnam y Laos y ofrecio la funcion artistica en varios lugares.

articles.title: Rubricados protocolos entre los goabiernos de Corea y Cuba
articles.content:
Rubricados protocolos entre los gobiernos de Corea y Cuba
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Quedaron firmados el dia 23 en esta capital el protocolo de la reunion de seguimiento para el desarrollo de la colaboracion economica y cientifico-tecnica para el ano 2011 y el otro sobre el intercambio comercial para el ano 2011, entre el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica de Cuba.
					  En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam y otros funcionarios, y por la cubana, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.

articles.title: ATCC comenta palabras histericas de Ros-Lehtinen
articles.content:
ATCC comenta palabras histericas de Ros-Lehtinen
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el miembro de la camara de representantes de Estados Unidos, Ros-Lehtinen, pronuncio palabras provocativas a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calificandola de "poder bribon" y abogando por tomar las "contramedidas intransigentes" y volver a definirla como "pais que apoya el terrorismo". 
					Sus dichos difaman y calumnian de la peor manera a la muy digna RPDC y su sistema social.
					
					Ros, figura representativa de las fuerzas conservadoras intransigentes de EE.UU., es conocido ampliamente en el mundo como maniaco anticomunista.
					
					Ese politiquero iletrado no sabe nada del origen y evolucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que sus disparates flotaron tan pronto como el fuera elegido como presidente del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores de la camara de representantes.
					
					 Esto significa la escalada de la campana anti-RPDC en el Congreso y el circulo politico de EE.UU.
					
					En efecto, se dan los movimientos en ese sentido.
					
					El senador John McCain juro trabajar para que en el nuevo periodo legislativo del proximo ano se recuperen inmediatamente las medidas de sancion a la RPDC como la definicion de ella como "pais que apoya el terrorismo" y la sancion financiera. 
					
					En adhesion a las fuerzas conservadoras, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano aclaro en el recien publicado "informe de revision de desarrollo diplomatico de 4 anos" que "intensificaria la sancion sobre las actividades financieras ilegales" del Norte de Corea.
					
					Ellos insisten en esas medidas cuestionando el choque armado en la isla Yonphyong y las actividades nucleares con fines pacificos de la RPDC.
					
					Esto significa el comportamiento de los que son capaces de cualquier cosa para alcanzar sus metas politicas y militares.
					
					La anterior administracion norteamericana tacho a la RPDC de la lista de "paises que apoyan el terrorismo", pero esto no fue un "favor", sino es una medida tomada segun el principio de "accion vs. accion", estipulado en la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre acerca de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Nadie puede objetarlo. 
					
					Sin embargo, al plantear el problema de reincluir a la RPDC en la lista de los "paises que apoyan el terrorismo", los conservadores intransigentes de EE.UU. tratan de impedir a toda costa la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea nunca perdonaran a los tipejos como Ros.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza la alianza militar tripartita
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza la alianza militar tripartita
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Al referirse a la "provocacion adicional" de alguien durante su reciente visita a Japon, el presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de Estados Unidos dijo que hace falta fortalecer pronto la "cooperacion en la rama de seguridad" entre su pais, Japon y el Sur de Corea y esforzarse por poner en practica los ejercicios militares trilaterales.
					  En un comentario individual divulgado este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun apunto que esas palabras anacronicas llaman a establecer la alianza militar tripartita en el Nordeste Asiatico para acabar con la paz y la estabilidad de esta region y buscar la nueva guerra fria.
					
					  La provocacion adicional proviene del mismo EE.UU. que agrava malintencionadamente la tension de la Peninsula Coreana para tomarla como pretexto del establecimiento de dicha alianza, endurece la amenaza militar sobre la RPDC, pone en peligro la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico y lleva la situacion al borde de guerra, comienza el comentario y continua:
					
					  Bajo el pretexto del intrigante incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", EE.UU. resolvio a su conveniencia el problema de traslado de su base militar en Futenma, Japon, y el de dilacion de "traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra" al Sur de Corea y creo el antecedente de la presencia de su flotilla de ataque en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					  De esta manera, procuro las circunstancias favorables para poner en operacion real la alianza militar EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea.
					
					  En el mismo contexto, fraguo el incidente de la isla Yonphyong con el siniestro objetivo de completar la formacion de la referida alianza militar y sentar la base de la fundacion de la OTAN de version asiatica.
					
					  Este intento lo comprueban los recientes ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y EE.UU.-Japon y la gira del presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU. por estos paises asiaticos para realizar por primera vez las maniobras conjuntas de las fuerzas armadas de 3 partes.
					
					  Esta equivocada la intencion del imperio de construir la alianza militar tripartita para tomar la supremacia militar y generar la nueva guerra fria en el Nordeste Asiatico y convertirse en el "triunfador" de ella.
					
					  EE.UU. debe liberarse del modo de pensar de la guerra fria.
